Method Detail

loadDataset

public Movielens loadDataset(java.io.File sourceFile)
                      throws java.io.FileNotFoundException

Loads data from a specified source.

A movielens ratings file constains lines in the following form: UserID::MovieID::Rating::Timestamp

  • UserIDs range between 1 and 6040
  • MovieIDs range between 1 and 3952
  • Ratings are made on a 5-star scale (whole-star ratings only, 1 to 5)
  • Timestamp is represented in seconds since the epoch as returned by time(2)

Each user has at least 20 ratings. The Timestamp is discarded, while userID, movieID and rating are stored in the object itself.

Parameters:
sourceFile - the file from which to load the data
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException
